Content.Text:
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
<MYNAME>, you look kinda pale. Are you okay?
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_QUESTION_L><FACE_ANGRY>Wha...? The baby's coming?! We've gotta get to
the clinic!

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's it. Keep it up, honey. Just a little bit
longer now.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>The baby is trying really hard, too. You're almost
there.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
I'm sorry, but give us a little longer. The birthing
process is still underway.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well done. Both babies have arrived, safe and
sound.
<PAGE>
<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Well look at that...twins! A boy and a girl, and
they're both cute as a button.
<PAGE>
Now then. Angela, honey, would you go call
Fritz over?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
As you heard, you are the father of twins, a boy
and a girl. They seem to be in perfect health.
<PAGE>
This way, please.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations, honey! I know it can't have
been easy having twins for your first birthing,
but you really hung in there!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Well done, <MYNAME>. Your composure was
quite commendable, especially for it being your
first time.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Whoa, I never expected twins! You must've had
a hard time in there, <MYNAME>, but thanks for
bringing 'em into this world.
<PAGE>
Now both of us are gonna have to do our best to
raise 'em up right.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R>Heh heh...look at how small their little hands
are. They're both so cute, too! I knew our kids
would be the best. ♪

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sooo...have you decided on names for your little
bundles of joy?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>A name is the first gift parents give to their
children. Be sure to pick good ones now, honey.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...that's a good question. Well, let's start
with our son.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>We've gotta give him a really cool name! What
do you think we should name him, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, <CHILD_NAME_M> is the name you'd like to give
our son?

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No
Yes

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<CHILD_NAME_M>, eh? Yeah, that has a nice ring to it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Now, how about our daughter? We've gotta give
her a really cute name!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, <CHILD_NAME_W> is the name you'd like for our
daughter?

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No
Yes

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<CHILD_NAME_W>, eh? Yeah, that sounds perfect!
You're so good at this naming stuff,
<MYNAME>. ♪
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R><FACE_LOVE>From now on, <CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W> are
a part of our big, happy family.

From now on, Fritz and I will do our very best to
raise <CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W> right.
We can do it!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
C'mon, you've gotta come up with a good name.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>, is it just me, or are you a little
pale?
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_QUESTION_L><FACE_LOSS>What...? The baby is coming?!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_NORMAL>All right. I know you must be nervous, but don't
worry. I'm here for you. Come, let us hurry to
the clinic.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's it. Keep it up, honey. Just a little bit
longer now.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>The baby is trying really hard, too. You're almost
there.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
I'm sorry, but give us a little longer. The birthing
process is still underway.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well done. Both babies have arrived, safe and
sound.
<PAGE>
<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Well look at that...twins! A boy and a girl, and
they're both cute as a button.
<PAGE>
Now then. Angela, honey, would you go call
Klaus over?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
As you heard, you are the father of twins, a boy
and a girl. They seem to be in perfect health.
<PAGE>
This way, please.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations, honey! I know it can't have
been easy having twins for your first birthing,
but you really hung in there!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Well done, <MYNAME>. Your composure was
quite commendable, especially for it being your
first time.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Twins, huh? Well, I didn't see that coming.
Birthing them must have been a trying
experience, <MYNAME>. Well done.
<PAGE>
Thank you for bringing them into this world.
From now on, let us do our very best to raise
them both to be wonderful people.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
They're quite adorable. Our daughter has your
eyes. I'm sure she'll grow up to be a beautiful
woman.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sooo...have you decided on names for your little
bundles of joy?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>A name is the first gift parents give to their
children. Be sure to pick good ones now, honey.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
True. A name is one thing children carry with
them throughout their lives, so we ought to give
this some careful consideration.
<PAGE>
Let's begin with our son. Do you have any good
names in mind, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is <CHILD_NAME_M> the name you'd like to give our
son?

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No
Yes

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<CHILD_NAME_M>? Yes, that will do nicely. And now
for our daughter. Anything come to mind?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is <CHILD_NAME_W> the name you'd like for our
daughter?

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No
Yes

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME_W>? Not bad. Let's go with that.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R><FACE_LAUGH>So, it's <CHILD_NAME_M>, <CHILD_NAME_W>, you and I.
From now on, let's do all we can to make our
little family of four the happiest it can be.

From now on, Klaus and I will do our very best
to raise <CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W> right. We
can do it!

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You really do need to come up with a proper
name. Our children cannot simply go through
life as "Hey you."

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whoa, <MYNAME>, you're pale as milk. Are you
feeling all right?
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_QUESTION_L><FACE_ANGRY>W-wha? The baby is coming?!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_LOSS>Holy moley, we've gotta get you to the clinic!

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's it. Keep it up, honey. Just a little bit
longer now.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>The baby is trying really hard, too. You're almost
there.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
I'm sorry, but give us a little longer. The birthing
process is still underway.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well done. Both babies have arrived, safe and
sound.
<PAGE>
<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Well look at that...twins! A boy and a girl, and
they're both cute as a button.
<PAGE>
Now then. Angela, honey, would you go call
Raeger over?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
As you heard, you are the father of twins, a boy
and a girl. They seem to be in perfect health.
<PAGE>
This way, please.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations, honey! I know it can't have
been easy having twins for your first birthing,
but you really hung in there!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Well done, <MYNAME>. Your composure was
quite commendable, especially for it being your
first time.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, twins. There's a two-for-one deal, eh? I
know it had to have been hard on you, but
thanks for bringing them into the world for us.
<PAGE>
Let's do everything we can to raise our kids
right.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Man, they're cute. Are all babies this adorable, or
just ours? I think it's just ours. Geez, five
minutes and I'm already a doting dad.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sooo...have you decided on names for your little
bundles of joy?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>A name is the first gift parents give to their
children. Be sure to pick good ones now, honey.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, let's start with our son, then. How about
you do the honors, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME_M> is what you want for our son, right?

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No
Yes

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<CHILD_NAME_M>? Yeah, I like that one too. Now,
what about our daughter?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME_W> sounds good for our daughter,
then?

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No
Yes

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME_W>? That name seems like it was made
for her. Let's go with it.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R><FACE_LAUGH>Well, <CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W> have joined
our little family. Let's do our best to make it a
happy one.

From now on, Raeger and I will do our very best
to raise <CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W> right. We
can do it!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
C'mon, these are our kids. They can't just be
"baby boy" and "baby girl" forever, y'know.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, you look awfully pale. Are you
feeling well?
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_QUESTION_L><FACE_SAD>What? The baby is coming?!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_NORMAL>I-I see. Don't worry. I am right here beside you.
Everything will be just fine. Let's make for the
clinic, quickly.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's it. Keep it up, honey. Just a little bit
longer now.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>The baby is trying really hard, too. You're almost
there.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
I'm sorry, but give us a little longer. The birthing
process is still underway.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well done. Both babies have arrived, safe and
sound.
<PAGE>
<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Well look at that...twins! A boy and a girl, and
they're both cute as a button.
<PAGE>
Now then. Angela, honey, would you go call
Mistel over?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
As you heard, you are the father of twins, a boy
and a girl. They seem to be in perfect health.
<PAGE>
This way, please.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations, honey! I know it can't have
been easy having twins for your first birthing,
but you really hung in there!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Well done, <MYNAME>. Your composure was
quite commendable, especially for it being your
first time.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Unbelievable. I was unsure what to expect, but
twins had never even crossed my mind.
<PAGE>
Your body must have been under a terrible
amount of strain. You must be feeling exhausted
right now.
<PAGE>
But...thank you for bringing both of our
wonderful children into the world.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Look how precious they are. Our daughter
smiles just like you, you know. She'll probably
be the talk of the town someday.
<PAGE>
And our son...well, I would certainly be proud if
he grew up to look like me.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sooo...have you decided on names for your little
bundles of joy?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>A name is the first gift parents give to their
children. Be sure to pick good ones now, honey.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A very good point. Do you have any
suggestions, <MYNAME>? Let us begin with our
son.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, our son is to be <CHILD_NAME_M>, correct?

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No
Yes

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<CHILD_NAME_M>? I think that is a fine name. I hope
he'll think so too.
<PAGE>
Now, what about our daughter?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Then our daughter shall be called <CHILD_NAME_W>,
correct?

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No
Yes

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<CHILD_NAME_W>? I like the sound of that. 
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R><FACE_NORMAL>Well, our family has doubled in size! Let's do our
best to help <CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W> have
wonderful lives.

Mistel and I will do our very best to raise
<CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W> right.
We can do it!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm afraid we cannot really move forward without
giving our babies names.

<FACE_NADI><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Uh, <MYNAME>? You look kinda pale.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_QUESTION_L><FACE_SAD>Wha? The baby's coming?! H-hold on. Already?!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_LOSS>Well okay, so maybe it's been long enough, but
never mind that. We've gotta get you to the
clinic!

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's it. Keep it up, honey. Just a little bit
longer now.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>The baby is trying really hard, too. You're almost
there.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
I'm sorry, but give us a little longer. The birthing
process is still underway.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well done. Both babies have arrived, safe and
sound.
<PAGE>
<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Well look at that...twins! A boy and a girl, and
they're both cute as a button.
<PAGE>
Now then. Angela, honey, would you go call
Nadi over?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
As you heard, you are the father of twins, a boy
and a girl. They seem to be in perfect health.
<PAGE>
This way, please.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations, honey! I know it can't have
been easy having twins for your first birthing,
but you really hung in there!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Well done, <MYNAME>. Your composure was
quite commendable, especially for it being your
first time.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Whoa, twins. Didn't see that one comin'.
<PAGE>
It must've been hard, carrying them around and
havin' to eat for three. But...thanks for bringing
them into this world for us.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Look how tiny they are. It's hard to imagine we
were so teensy once, too.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>So cute...

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sooo...have you decided on names for your little
bundles of joy?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>A name is the first gift parents give to their
children. Be sure to pick good ones now, honey.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Great. Put me in the hot seat, why don'tcha? I've
got so many things whirling around in my mind
that my head feels like it's gonna pop.
<PAGE>
How 'bout you, <MYNAME>? Any strokes of
inspiration? Let's start with our son's name.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You wanna go with <CHILD_NAME_M> for our son?

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No
Yes

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<CHILD_NAME_M>? Sounds perfect to me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>We're not done yet, though. Still got a daughter
to name!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME_W> for our daughter...that sound good
to you?

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No
Yes

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<CHILD_NAME_W>? I like it. Let's call her that.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>So, <CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W>. Let's do what
we can to make our family a happy one.

Nadi and I will do our very best to raise
<CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W> right.
We can do it!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Even the animals on your farm have names, so
you've gotta at least give our kids that much.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
You're looking a bit pale, <MYNAME>. You feelin'
all right?
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_QUESTION_L><FACE_ANGRY>Wait, what? The baby is coming?! Whoa-ho-ho,
we've gotta get you down to the clinic!

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's it. Keep it up, honey. Just a little bit
longer now.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>The baby is trying really hard, too. You're almost
there.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
I'm sorry, but give us a little longer. The birthing
process is still underway.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well done. Both babies have arrived, safe and
sound.
<PAGE>
<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Well look at that...twins! A boy and a girl, and
they're both cute as a button.
<PAGE>
Now then. Angela, honey, would you go call
Kamil over?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
As you heard, you are the father of twins, a boy
and a girl. They seem to be in perfect health.
<PAGE>
This way, please.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations, honey! I know it can't have
been easy having twins for your first birthing,
but you really hung in there!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Well done, <MYNAME>. Your composure was
quite commendable, especially for it being your
first time.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, twins. You must've been working overtime
in here, <MYNAME>. I'll bet you're exhausted.
<PAGE>
I know it must've been hard, but thanks for
bringing them into the world. It'll be worth it in
the long run. Promise.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Haha, they're so cute. They can barely wrap their
little hands around my finger.
<PAGE>
Hey, little guys. Congratulations on being born!
<PAGE>
Your mama and papa have been waiting a long
time to meet you.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sooo...have you decided on names for your little
bundles of joy?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>A name is the first gift parents give to their
children. Be sure to pick good ones now, honey.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Names, huh? That's a good question. Let's start
with our bouncing baby boy, here.
<PAGE>
Any sudden bursts of inspiration, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You like the sound of <CHILD_NAME_M>, huh?

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No
Yes

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<CHILD_NAME_M>, then? I think that's a great name.
He'll be proud to have it...once he's old enough
to speak.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Now then, let's turn our attention to our little
baby girl.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You think <CHILD_NAME_W> sounds good for our
daughter?

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No
Yes

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<CHILD_NAME_W>? Yeah. That sounds just right for
her.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>So, <CHILD_NAME_M>, <CHILD_NAME_W>, and us...
That makes a busy family of four. Let's make it a
great one!

Kamil and I will do our very best to raise
<CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W> right.
We can do it!

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whoa, slow down there, champ. If you don't
name these kids, I won't know what to call
them.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
O-oh my... All of a sudden, my stomach feels as
though it's in an uproar. ...I-is the baby coming?

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's it. Keep it up, honey. Just a little bit
longer now.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>Ow...! It hurts! I-I can't push anymore...!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>You can do it. The baby is trying really hard, too.
You're almost there.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
I'm sorry, but give us a little longer. The birthing
process is still underway.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well done. Both babies have arrived, safe and
sound.
<PAGE>
<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Well look at that...twins! A boy and a girl, and
they're both cute as a button.
<PAGE>
Now then. Angela, honey, would you go call
<MYNAME> over?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
As you heard, you are the father of twins, a boy
and a girl. They seem to be in perfect health.
<PAGE>
This way, please.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Congratulations, honey! I know it can't have
been easy having twins for your first birthing,
but you did great, Elise!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>Indeed, well done. Your composure was quite
commendable, especially for it being your first
time.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you. It was so tough I thought I wasn't 
going to make it...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>But now all I feel is warmth and happiness. I
never expected twins, but all of a sudden, I can't
imagine myself without them.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ohoho...You look quite pleased with yourself as
well, <MYNAME>. We'll have to make sure our
precious babies get plenty of love and care.

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
By the by, have you decided on names for your
little bundles of joy?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>A name is the first gift parents give to their
children. Be sure to pick good ones now, honey.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A very good point. We must give them noble,
regal names befitting their status! I'm sure you
already have some ideas, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
Let's begin with our son.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, so you favor <CHILD_NAME_M> for our son's
name?

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No
Yes

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<CHILD_NAME_M>? Ah, it sounds lovely. A marvelous
choice, especially coming from you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Now, how about our darling daughter?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Mmm. You think <CHILD_NAME_W> sounds good for
our little girl?

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No
Yes

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<CHILD_NAME_W>? I'm in full agreement. It's a
splendid name for her.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>Welcome to our family, <CHILD_NAME_M> and
<CHILD_NAME_W>. From now on, we'll both do all we
can to provide you only the best life has to offer.

From now on, Elise and I will do our very best to
raise <CHILD_NAME_M> and <CHILD_NAME_W> right. We can
do it!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Come now. I'm sure you have some elegant,
beautiful names you've been saving up, right?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Oh dear. I just started feeling some real
contractions down in my belly. I...I think the
baby may be coming...

<FACE_MARIAN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's it. Keep it up, honey. Just a little bit
longer now.
<PAGE>
<FACE_IRIS><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>N...nnnngh...!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGELA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>You can do it. The baby is trying really hard, too.
